column4: i have one computer for each linux distribution available, so i get the best of all worlds!
Anyone here use X-Chat for Ubuntu? Trying to make it automatically connect to #ubuntu, #ubunto-offtopic, and #winehq when I open the program, but it only wants to connect to #ubuntu.
its under server options.
thanks I'll check... variant - not Gnome
well, you're using Xchat right?.
sorry, after highlighting on Freenode, you need to click edit.
did it work?
not yet gonna try again, but i think i got it
OK it didn't work. I did #ubuntu,#ubuntu-offtopic in the Channel section, maybe I should try #ubuntu,ubuntu-offtopic wiithout a 2nd #
no, you had it right the first time
are you sure there's no space after the comma?... there should be no space there.
it worked, thanks :)
no prb.
you have a space after the comma?
i think i did something wrong cause now 2 #ubuntus are open :P no biggie i'll mess with the config, hope i'm not spammy loggin on and off
no space after the comma, it actually deleted the spacea fter i put it there
you're listed as in ubuntu twice?
yah, it did Ubuntu Servers > #ubuntu, and Freenode > #ubuntu, #ubuntu-offtopic
thats why, go back to your network list, highlight freenode, edit, and choose, "Connec tot this server only"
or highlight the ubuntu channel, and choose not to connnect to it
worked perfectly. Logged into #ubuntu and #ubuntu-offtopic. Thanks for the step-by-step
